metadata.name: Renamed Microsoft Teams Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed Microsoft Teams binary.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('msteams\.exe', 'teams\.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msteams.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\teams.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed Microsoft Teams binary.

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
